index.subtitulo: Second most loved platform in the world
index.descricao: World Books is your platform to connect you with millions of books and writers around the world. Explore your imagination, develop stories and interact with various authors around the world.

login.texto: Welcome back to Worldbook! Log in and continue supporting writers and showing the world their universes!

direitos_autorais.label: Author's Rights
direitos_autorais.aviso: This allows anyone to use your story for any purpose — they can print it, sell it, or turn it into a movie.

somos.label: We are NetDev
somos.descricao:
We are a company specialized in technical assistance, repair, preventive and corrective maintenance, configuration and installation of computer equipment, networks and peripherals. We have been operating since 2006, collaborating with our customers and partners in obtaining better results, making them more competitive.

IT services at your fingertips, for individuals, small and medium-sized companies. We offer in-home technical assistance services, with a notebook technician to provide support in your home environment WINDOWS and MAC APPLE. Maintenance and implementation of Wi-Fi wireless network, home and business for large environments.

We make the difference, because we do things differently. We seek quality solutions at low cost, to satisfy the most specific needs of our customers. Our customer service is personalized and understands what you need, to meet your expectations. So you and your company can focus on what really matters to the business.

Our objective is to offer creative and efficient solutions with quality, flexibility and speed for our customers. To do this, we have a technical team, qualified in different technological platforms, constantly updating and improving. We work to ensure the stability of systems and technologies.

missao.label: Our mission
missao.descricao: Exceeding the expectations of each client through excellence in the provision of innovative services, in order to make them even more competitive in their business, thus providing high quality technological solutions.

visao.label: Our vision
visao.descricao: To be seen as the main point of contact in the area of cutting-edge technology, offering quality services, with respect, responsibility and transparency, aiming for the full satisfaction of our customers and employees.

contatos.label: Contact
contatos.descricao:
You can contact us
through our service channels!

redes_sociais.label: Social networks
redes_sociais.descricao:
Follow us on social media! And stay
up to date with all the news

perguntas.resposta: WorldBoks is a free online book platform. Where you can post your own works and read those of other users!

perguntas.pergunta: Can I publish any of my work?
perguntas.resposta: Yes! You can publish any of your work as long as it does not violate the rules.

perguntas.pergunta: Can I read any work posted by other users?
perguntas.resposta: Yes, you can read any work posted by another user!
